scripts.jsonschema: for TYPE in $(cat src/generated/openapi/models/index.ts | grep export | rev | cut -d '/' -f 1 | rev | tr -d "';"); do echo "Generate JSON schema for type $TYPE"; time npx ts-json-schema-generator --tsconfig tsconfig.json --strict-tuples --additional-properties false --path src/generated/openapi/models/${TYPE}.ts --type ${TYPE} --out src/generated/json-schema/${TYPE}Schema.json; done
scripts.patchjsonschema: for SCHEMA in $(find src/generated/json-schema -name '*.json'); do echo  "Patch schema $SCHEMA"; sed -i '/.*$schema.*/d' $SCHEMA; done
